topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Algorithms :: Genetic Algorithms

name: Simple Genetic Algorithm API
short_description: Simple Genetic Algorithm is an API for programming simulations that implement a genetic algorithm. A genetic algorithm is a search technique used in artficial intelligence to find approximate solutions to optimization and search problems.
